name: CLEO Custom Mission
summary: Learn about .CM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: In order to use a CM file with GTA SA, it must be stored in the "game\CLEO" folder.

description: Custom mission created for Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas (GTA SA); similar to a CLEO.CS file, but saved as a mission instead of a custom script; used for adding extra missions, or levels, to the game; may be created with Sanny Builder, a GTA mod utility.
